job_tasks.phrase: improving diagnostics of infotainment issues (e.g., Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Audio, Display) based on vehicle/service data and customer service requests
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the goal of the work in the context of a business problem (infotainment diagnostics) and the data sources to be used.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with vast sources of Service-related data
job_tasks.justification: This implies working with and processing large amounts of data from various service-related sources.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage Large Language Models (LLMs) and data analysis to better understand and categorize customer service requests
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions the use of LLMs and data analysis for understanding and categorizing information, which falls under modeling tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize fleet-wide data to prototype ML models that reduce the time needed to diagnose and root cause new infotainment issues
job_tasks.justification: This clearly states the intention to prototype ML models using data to solve a specific diagnostic problem.

soft_skills.phrase: reduce the time needed to diagnose and root cause new infotainment issues

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use of Large Language Models (LLMs) for understanding and categorizing customer service requests. It also mentions prototyping ML models, which aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile's focus on generative techniques and building applications around them, particularly in understanding and processing textual data.
